Note: if you aren't sure about some of these fields, leave them empty.

**Full name of school**
Your school's actual, full name. For example, Ruben S. Ayala High School.

**Common name of school**
The name your school is best known by. For example, Ruben S. Ayala High School (full name) is better known as Ayala High School.

**Short name of school**
An common abbreviation or initialism. Ayala High School is commonly referred to as AHS; University of California, Los Angeles is commonly referred to as UCLA; and University of Pennsylvania is commonly referred to as UPenn or Penn.

**Location of school**
This is useful for general knowledge and also for timezone data. A city, district/province/state/etc., and country will suffice. For example, Chino Hills High School is in Chino Hills, California, United States of America.

**Describe the usual schedule**
How your school regularly schedules itself. For example, Chino Hills High School has `late start` schedule on Mondays and `regular` schedule on Tuesdays to Fridays. Regular schedule is from 8:35 am to 3:22 pm, and late start is from 9:25 am to 3:22 pm.

**Who will keep the context up to date?**
Will you keep the context up to date? Do you know someone who's usually aware of the coming school events and can keep the overrides in check? It's fine if you don't know how to do it, I can help with that :] Also, even if you don't have someone who can do this, it's okay. Submit this issue regardless!

**Anything else you want to let me know?**
Add any other comments, questions, concerns, or context here.
